resources.string:
Fast Math is an engaging math game designed to sharpen your calculation skills and speed. In this game, players are presented with a total sum and a single visible number

The objective is to select the correct number from six options that, when added to the visible number 

With each round timed, players must act swiftly to make the right choice

As players progress, the game tracks their correct answers, displaying a running count and an accuracy percentage to motivate improvement.
